text: My mum was warded for sacral infection of her back and heel. She was well looked after by Dr Chan, who also give us an elaborated daily update of her progress. My mumâ€™s condition improved greatly under his care. We truly appreciate his professionalism in looking after the very elderly.  Thank you, Dr Chan

A hard to come by doctor who is with a heart of gold. Genuinely concerned of his patients and very empathetic. Our family is so blessed to have found him years ago. Always grateful for his dedication in his work and his care for my dad. Thank you Dr Chan.
